item.description: Buttons # Buttons are styled links that can lead to local page or external link. Buttons Example # {{< button relref="/" [class="..."] >}}Get Home{{< /button >}} {{< button href="https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book" >}}Contribute{{< /button >}} Get Home Contribute Columns # Columns help organize shorter pieces of content horizontally for readability. {{< columns >}} <!-- begin columns block --> # Left Content Lorem markdownum insigne... <---> <!-- magic separator, between columns --> # Mid Content Lorem markdownum insigne.
